remarks: Lemma for isomorphism H of a lattice meet.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:

dihmeetlem15.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
dihmeetlem15N $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ Y e. B /\ ( p e. A /\ -. p .<_ W ) ) /\ ( ( r e. A /\ -. r .<_ W ) /\ r .<_ Y /\ ( Y ./\ p ) .<_ W ) ) -> ( ( I ` r ) i^i ( I ` p ) ) = { .0. } ) $.
